definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Your chances of being dissected just declined dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 你被解剖的概率已經大幅度下降。

sentences.english: Even so, other reports showed big drops in housing sales in May. That followed the end of a homebuyer's tax credit.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，其他報告顯示五月房價大幅度下跌。

sentences.english: It may raise the strength of the coarse grained soil.
sentences.chinese: 由於咬合力的存在，使粗粒土的強度大幅度提高。

sentences.english: Gives high earners big breaks on the payroll tax.
sentences.chinese: 給予高收入者較大幅度的收入稅減免。

sentences.english: Train services have been cut to the bone .
sentences.chinese: 列車車次已大幅度減少。

sentences.english: They compress muscle and can shave off seconds.
sentences.chinese: 同時壓緊肌肉，可以大幅度提高成績。

sentences.english: We have substantially increased our fuel-efficiency standards.
sentences.chinese: 我們大幅度提高了燃料效率標準。

sentences.english: Removing the seeds and white stems inside the pepper will reduce the heat level dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過去除辣椒裏的子和白筋來大幅度降低辣度。

sentences.english: They have promised to chop back their expenses in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 他們已答應在近期大幅度削減他們的開支。

sentences.english: The price of off-grid solar energy systems has decreased sharply.
sentences.chinese: 離網太陽能系統的價格大幅度下降。

sentences.english: It must have shifted enormously in this direction.
sentences.chinese: 它肯定在這個方向，大幅度移動。

sentences.english: Its accuracy is severly diminished when firing while not prone.
sentences.chinese: 在非臥射狀態下，它的射擊準確度將大幅度降低。

sentences.english: But they have really had a big scaling down of the mass transit system this year.
sentences.chinese: 但是今年確實大幅度削減了公共交通。

sentences.english: If you appoint us as your general agent, the turnover will be greatly increased.
sentences.chinese: 如果你方能委任我方爲總經理，營業額將大幅度增長。

sentences.english: Ever-shrinking commissioning budgets at home are a problem, too.
sentences.chinese: 國內曾經大幅度消減的預算也是一個重要問題。

sentences.english: This tradeoff allows the framework to drastically speed up application development.
sentences.chinese: 這個折衷允許框架大幅度加快應用程序開發的速度。

definition: to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
